title: type battles
content:
hello,  
does anybody know where can i find the theme for the new battle 29 for this week? or is it just every two weeks?
author: tesa

comments.content:
Haha, I was just looking around too. I suspect it hasn’t started yet, although it is supposed to be due today. Remember it’s still very early in the morning in the U.S. of A.

FWIW, [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105124/http:/www.typophile.com/typebattles) is the battles overview page. I assume/hope it will be accessible from there.

We’re in for a fun one this week. When it goes up it will be in the “Handpicked” column on the home page. It will also be in the Battle directory page here: [http://www.typophile.com/typebattles](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105124/http:/www.typophile.com/typebattles "http://www.typophile.com/typebattles")

And we always announce battles from our Twitter feed: [http://www.twitter.com/typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105124/http:/www.twitter.com/typophile "http://www.twitter.com/typophile")
